entry.et: Middle English arwe, from Old English; akin to Gothic arhwazna arrow, Latin arcus bow, arch, arc

def.dt: :a missile shot from a bow and usually having a slender shaft, a pointed head, and feathers at the butt
:a mark (as on a map or signboard) to indicate direction
:to move fast and straight like an arrow in flight :dart
:an arrow with a flat barbed head
:a mark shaped like a broad arrow that identifies government property including clothing formerly worn by convicts

entry.et: from the expression straight as an arrow

def.dt: :a person who lives by rigidly proper or conventional standards
city NE Oklahoma SE of Tulsa pop 74,859
